tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE weather_data (
    city_name VARCHAR(255),
    date DATE,
    temperature DECIMAL,
    humidity DECIMAL,
    PRIMARY KEY (city_name, date)
);

CREATE TABLE city_weather_data (
    city_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    temperature DECIMAL(5,2),
    humidity DECIMAL(5,2),
    wind_speed DECIMAL(5,2),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE sensor_data (
   sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   city_id INT,
   sensor_name TEXT,
   location TEXT,
   installation_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE buildings (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    building_name STRING,
    city_name STRING,
    building_type STRING,
    build_year INTEGER
);

CREATE TABLE energy_meter (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    meter_id STRING,
    building_id UUID,
    energy_type STRING,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    consumption DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE city_info (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    city_name STRING,
    population INTEGER,
    area_sq_km DECIMAL,
    sustainability_rating INTEGER
);
